summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York informing a recipient named Sigrid about Ghislaine Maxwell's third motion for bail. It indicates the motion is expected to be resolved on the papers, with a potential hearing to be scheduled.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email; she has submitted a third motion for bail in her criminal case.

persons.name: Sigrid
persons.context: The email is addressed to this person, who is being informed about Ghislaine Maxwell's bail motion.

persons.name: Si A McCawle
persons.context: The sender of the email, identified as an AUSA in the Southern District of New York, providing an update on the Maxwell case.

connections.description: McCawle, as an Assistant U.S. Attorney, is part of the prosecution team handling the criminal case against Maxwell.

events.title: Bail Motion Update
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell submits a third motion for bail in her criminal case.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell submitted a third motion for bail as of March 1, 2021.
The prosecution anticipated the bail motion would be resolved 'on the papers' without a hearing, but a hearing could be scheduled.
The communication is from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York to an individual named Sigrid.
